meanings.definition: (ラテン語) 養う、飼育する、放牧する、食べさせる、満たす、楽しませる
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to feed, pasture, graze, nourish, cherish, delight, entertain

etymology.value: 印欧祖語の *peh₂- 「守る、養う」に由来する。

verb_forms.present_active: pasco, pascis, pascit, pascimus, pascitis, pascunt
verb_forms.imperfect_active: pascebam, pascebas, pascebat, pascebamus, pascebatis, pascebant
verb_forms.future_active: pascam, pasces, pascet, pascemus, pascetis, pascent
verb_forms.perfect_active: pavi, pavisti, pavit, pavimus, pavistis, paverunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_active: paveram, paveras, paverat, paveramus, paveratis, paverant
verb_forms.future_perfect_active: pavero, paveris, paverit, paverimus, paveritis, paverint
verb_forms.present_passive: pascor, pasceris, pascitur, pascimur, pascimini, pascuntur
verb_forms.imperfect_passive: pascebar, pascebaris, pascebatur, pascebamur, pascebamini, pascebantur
verb_forms.future_passive: pascar, pasceris, pascetur, pascemur, pascemini, pascentur
verb_forms.perfect_passive: pastus sum, pastus es, pastus est, pasti sumus, pasti estis, pasti sunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_passive: pastus eram, pastus eras, pastus erat, pasti eramus, pasti eratis, pasti erant
verb_forms.future_perfect_passive: pastus ero, pastus eris, pastus erit, pasti erimus, pasti eritis, pasti erunt

usage_notes.explanation: pascereは、物理的な意味での「養う」だけでなく、比喩的な意味での「（感情や精神を）満たす、楽しませる」という意味も持ちます。

readability_explanation.text: pascereは古典ラテン語の動詞であり、現代英語の学習者には馴染みが薄いかもしれません。文学作品や歴史的なテキストで目にすることがあります。

example_sentences.translation: 我々は目と耳で精神を養う。
